name: Shell Smash
description: You break off a piece of your shell, lowering your defense but improving your attack. For the duration, lower your AC by 1, but add proficiency to all damage rolls (once per move). This move is not stackable.

effect.name: Excites the audience a lot if used last.
effect.effect: Raises the crowd meter by 2 if successfully performed last in correct contest, raises the crowd meter by 1 if successfully performed last in complementary contest.
